titleStmt.title: A concordance or table made after the order of the alphabet, conteyning the principall both wordes & matters, which are comprehended in the newe Testament, / gathered by T.W.
titleStmt.author: T. W.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Christopher Barker, Printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn, stained and cropped, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
